actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain motorcycles brought into the United States by participants in the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally and Races, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment, through August 15, 1995, of U.S. motorcycles which have been exported and temporarily brought back into the United States by nonresidents participating in the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally and Races.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain motorcycles brought into the United States by participants in the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally and Races, and for other purposes.
